segments.text: I'd like to open a current account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . May I see your social security and your ID , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . I wonder how much interest can I earn from a current account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , current accounts don't pay out interest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's primarily designed for business transactions . That is , writing checks to pay for bills , buying things and sending money . We won't expect a large amount of deposit in a current account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How do I draw money for my own use then ?
segments.speaker: S1
